inn1.comm: takes a couple of steps straightaway, but the ball swings past the bat
stays on the backfoot and plays a curving delivery towards the off-side
again takes a couple of steps down and defends the ball towards the off-side
length ball, moving away and this time Nicol lets it go to the keeper
Malinga bowls from wide of the crease, and bowls it slightly short of length, defended on the back foot
length delivery, curving away, defended off the front foot.
gentle loosener by Kula, 71.3 mph, defended towards the off side
comes in from wide of off stump line, defended off the back foot.
full ball, Watling wanted to drive it, but the movement meant the ball took an inside edge and hit the pad
this ones jags away and Watling's waft meets thin air
an inswinger to follow, hits the inside edge and wraps him on the pads
straight and it is defended by Watling, a second maiden over in a row
charges again and Nicol wanted to drive it over covers, the ball took outside half of the bat and flew in the air over point
takes the edge and lands short of Jayawardene at second slip
length ball, swings away and goes past the outside edge
pitched up on the pads, there was some movement but Nicol drives it through midwicket for a boundary
length ball, lands on the off stump line and jags away. Nicol came on the front foot to defend but missed that completely
length ball, moves away and Nicol lets it go
short ball and Watling takes his eyes off the ball, that is the first bouncer for the over
lenght ball, defended towards the off side
fulller and Watling drives it without much timing towards mid-on
length ball outside off, guides it towards third man
fuller ball, comes in and Nicol plays it towards fine leg
length ball, slightly slower, driven straight to covers
charges again, as he has done since the start, and wanted to hit it towards midwicket, but the ball takes an outside edge and flies past a diving Jayawardene to the third-man boundary
stays on the back foot now, and defends a short of a length ball towards off side
full ball, swings away after pitching around off stump line, defended towards point on the front foot
uses his feet to Malinga again, and the length is short and Nicol blasted it straight to the mid-off fielder
length ball, left alone outside off
full ball, takes the outside half of the bat as Nicol goes for the drive, goes past a diving point to third man
charges and misses completely, Nicol wanted to hoick it over long on but the ball comes in and goes between the bat and the pad
short down the leg side
charges down and Kula responds with a bouncer which goes down to the leg side
Kula moves it away this time and beats the outside edge, stifled appeal is turned down by the umpire
full and closer to the off stump, moves away right at the last moment to beat Nicol's attempted drive
fuller ball, driven straight to mid off
down the leg side, moves away further and that's the third wide of the over
fuller ball, Nicol uses his feet again and tried to swing it over mid on. Barely gets any timing there and the ball lobs straight to mid on.
gentle ball, 118 kph, defended back to the bowler
full ball on the off stump, is timed well towards midwicket. Herath pulls the ball back just in time.
slower length ball, McCullum lets it go with an exaggerated movement
length ball on off, turned towards square leg
length ball on the off stump line, defended towards mid on
length ball, hit off the back foot straight to short cover
short of length, comes in with the angle, turned towards square leg
big movement into the batsman, McCullum waits and punches it towards midwicket
length ball, not much movement and McCullum punches it though extra cover to open his account
length ball, on the middle stump, defended towards short midwicket
comes in with the angle, turned towards fine leg for an easy single
fuller outside off, timed in the gap between the fielders around point
length ball, McCullum goes on the back foot and punches it towards the right of mid on
short of good length, defended off the back foot
fuller this time, on the off stump, defended towards the leg side
short of length, punched towards mid on off the back foot
similar ball, similar result, straight to mid on
length ball, wider this time, moves away and Watling pounces on the opportunity to slam it past the diving point fielder
short ball on the middle, turned away towards fine leg
on the leg stump line, turned away towards square leg
short of length, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
short of a good length, defended towards covers off the back foot
similar ball, defended again off the back foot
short of length, McCullum wanted to play it towards square leg, misses it and ball drops on his feet. Watling calls for a quick single and the batsmen make it easily in the end.
short of length, McCullum goes back but doesn't get his timing right
charges down and lifts the ball over the long-off boundary.
flighted ball, defended towards covers
shortish ball, on the legs, waits and turns it to square leg
slow and flighted, defended on the front foot
waits on the back foot and punches it to long on for an easy single
short of good length, nips away and goes past the outside edge
short on the middle stump, knocked into the leg side

short, gets on the back foot, McCullum pushes it gently towards midwicket, completes the first run, calls for the second. Watling responds but he is too late as Kula collects and throws to the non-striker's end and the bowler takes off the bails
short delivery and gets up on McCullum, who jumps to avoid the ball, but the ball gets an edge and flies over the keeper
short ball, punched towards point and there is more hesitation, Taylor was gone had it hit and he had given up completely. The throw was way off the mark
length ball, outside off, stays a bit low, Taylor lets it go
flatter from Herath, punched to long on off the back foot
slow and flighted, Taylor taps it towards covers and sets off, but there is no run and Taylor is rightly sent back by McCullum.
defended off the front foot on the leg side
tapped towards point for a single
flighted, McCullum defend it towards mid on but Herath is quick to field it cut off the single
on the leg stump, turned to the left of the square leg fielder for an easy single
short of length, turned towards third man for a single
length ball, on the off stump, Taylor lets it go and the ball just goes over the middle stump.
short of length, defended towards point where Chandimal makes a driving stop but can't prevent the single
short of length on the off, hops and turns it towards midwicket for a single
finally a fuller ball from Perera but Taylor was slow to come forward, hits it towards the off side without any timing
length ball on the off and middle, turned towards midwicket
flighted on the middle and leg, defended to midwicket
on the pads, turned straight to square leg
flighted on the middle, and driven to the right of mid on for a single
full and flighted, defended back to the bowler
full, driven to long off for a single
takes a couple of steps to a flighted delivery and places it towards mid on and completes a quick single
length ball, defended off the front foot towards mid off
short and punched towards the deep cover for a single
waits for the short of length ball and punches it to point
wide length ball, Taylor wanted to smash it towards the extra cover region but edges it straight to the keeper. Wild shot there by Taylor
full and flighted, defended back to the bowler
more of the same again, defended back to the bowler
full and flighted, driven straight to cover
slower outside the off stump, driven to cover
closer to the off stump, slightly faster, and McCullum was caught on the crease. The inside edge goes towards short fine leg
pushed towards long off for a single
short of length, McCullum wanted to punch it on the off side, but inside edges it back to the bowler
waits on the back foot and turns it to the deep square leg fielder
fuller length outside off, and Williamson lets it go
short of length, dabbed towards point but there is no chance of a run
short of length, gets up on Williamson, but is defended on the off side
fuller ball, driven without much power or timing to mid off
flighted on the off, defended to covers
fuller and faster, again defended off the front foot
flighted on the middle stump line, defended straight down the pitch
on the middle and leg line, flicked straight to the square-leg fielder
waits on the back foot and punches it wide of long on for a single
flatter and way outside the leg stump
flighted on the off stump, Williamson waits and punches it to deep extra cover to open his account
length ball, Williamson leaves his bat hanging and it beats the outside edge.
on the middle stump, hurrying the batsman with extra pace, takes the outside edge to third man
length ball, pushed off the back foot to deep cover
113 kph, slower bouncer, and Williamson has all the time to duck under it
length ball and punched off the back foot through the off side, runs between the cover and point fielder for a boundary
short of length ball, on the off stump, defended off the back foot
McCullum charges at Herath after playing a number of dot balls off him, but the ball was flatter and it went flat off the bat, straight to Chandimal at long on.
full ball, driven towards long on
waits for a slow delivery and punches it off the back foot to deep cover
on the middle, turned towards the sweeper on the leg side, batsmen wanted two, but the fielder was quick to cut off the second.
on the pads, punched off the back foot towards deep square leg
Franklin waits for the ball on the back foot and opens the face to dab it towards short third man for a quick single
starts with a quick bouncer, Franklin gets behind it and pulls it towards deep square leg
wide of off stump, guided to the third-man fielder easily
on the pads, and the batsmen call for a quick leg bye after the ball rolls on the leg side
full ball on the legs, timed towards deep midwicket for two
short of length by Malinga, quick too, Williamson gets on top of the bounce and dabs it towards midwicket for a single
full ball on the legs again, and Franklin flicks that to deep square leg easily. Malinga struggling with his line slightly, especially as he has got a slip in place for both batsmen
Length ball, takes outside edge to third man
length ball on the off stump, Williamson sets off immediately after playing it towards mid on
short of length, moving away, Franklin punches it towards deep cover off the back foot
short and quicker, Williamson ducks under the bouncer easily
another short ball, Williamson pulls it to deep fine leg this time for a single
length ball on the legs, hits the pads and the batsmen run for a leg bye
outside off, and Franklin lets it go
close, as Franklin waits on the back foot for a ball that turns in, takes the inside edge and rolls between his legs very close to the stumps.
on the middle, punched towards deep midwicket
flighted on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
flighted, draws Williamson forward who is not to the pitch, hits the bat and hits the pad. The inside edge saved him there
short on the legs and is pulled easily to the deep square leg boundary
length ball on the off, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
fuller and wider off the stumps, Franklin doesn't take the bait and lets it go to the keeper
fuller ball outside off, and Franklin doesn't come fully forward, the ball takes the outside edge and runs down to the third-man boundary
fuller on the off stump, punched to mid on for a single
short of length, defended off the back foot
fuller and on the off stump, solidly defended off the front foot
full and flighted, driven to mid off, but the batsmen call early and complete the single
flighted on the off stump, defended off the front foot to the left of Mendis
flighted on the legs, Williamson takes a couple of steps and drives it to the right of mid on for a single
flighted on the pads, and Franklin defends it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, and Franklin drives it powerfully but straight to extra cover
flatter outside off, Franklin waits and dabs it to short third man, wants to take a single, but Williamson turns him down.
more of the back foot defence to a length ball
full on the legs and that is flicked towards deep square leg. Had he left it, that would have been a wide.
length ball, comes into the left-hander, but Franklin lets it go. Not too far from the off stump
similar ball, but defended back to the bowler off the front foot this time
length ball outside off, played off the back foot straight to point
slower length ball, invites the front foot defence again
flighted outside off stump, Williamson charges and drives it to long off for a single
71.9 mph, googly by Mendis, defended back to the bowler
flighted outside off, driven to mid on for a single

79.8 mph, it is the googly again, flighted outside off, Williamson wanted to drive it to the cover region and is beaten by the flight, the ball, to his horror, then spins in and hits the top of middle and leg.
it is two in two now, another googly to bamboozle Nathan McCullum. Flighted outside off and McCullum goes forward for a poke, the ball turns in to him and hits the off stump.
full and flighted, fuller than what he would have likes, Ellis plants his front foot and defends it back to the bowler. Hat-trick averted.
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot
fuller, outside off, Franklin lets it go through to the keeper
short ball, Franklin wanted to guide it over slips, but pulls his bat in at the last moment
length ball outside off, played to point
fuller ball on the off, takes and inside edge and goes towards deep midwicket
short of length, outside off, defended to the off side
another googly, pitches outside leg and takes outside edge from Franklin's bat to head towards short third man where a misfield allows a single

flighted on the middle, Ellis goes for a sweep and misses the ball completely as it hits him in front of middle and off. Easy decision for the umpire there. The ball didn't turn as struck the batsman on the full.
very wide down the leg side
slow and flighted, Southee wanted to launch it over midwicket, makes no connection
down the track to a ball on off stump, hits it towards deep midwicket from the inside half of his bat
flighted on the left stump, Franklin takes a couple of steps and plays it to deep midwicket for a couple
steps out again and drives it to wide long on to keep the  strike
short of length, turned towards deep midwicket for a single
short of length, and Southee is dropped at the deep midwicket boundary by Tharanga. Went straight to him and it popped out.
wide yorker, as Southee makes room and finds the ball out of his reach
full and Southee can't get it away, goes as far as mid on
now another wide yorker to the left-hander, Franklin makes room and the ball is too far from him, misses it completely
full and straight yorker, Franklin walked across and wanted to guide it towards fine leg, misses it and that was hitting the middle stump
slower ball, on the legs and Southee gets lucky as it lands in between the long on fielder and the midwicket, he gets back for two
slower ball on length, the ball arrives after Southee's swing is over, completely beaten
third slower ball in a row, Southee wanted to hit it towards the leg side but manages a leading edge that goes to third man
another slower ball, and Milne manages to chip it over the infield on the off side, first runs for Milne in ODI cricket
full and straight this time, but slightly off target as Milne gets his bat down and squeezes it past point for a boundary
slower ball, but Milne gets under it and finishes the innings in style, sending the ball clear of the long on boundary, and it is not a short boundary. That was a good final blow by the 20 year old

inn2.comm: length ball, swings away from Tharanga who lets it go
length ball outside off, doesn't swing as much as the previous one, but is left alone
short of length and comes in, Tharana dabs it down to the leg side and wanted a single, but is rightly sent back by Chandimal as Bould fields
length ball, leaves Tharanga's attempted back foot drive. That was played away from the body
down the leg side, that is one run less to get
outside off, swings away and beats the bat again, not much feet movement from Tharanga.
another outswinger, Tharanga doesn't get lured by it and he lets it go
short of length ball, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
wider of off stump and swings away who pokes at the ball and misses
length ball on off stump, swinging away, takes the outside edge and goes to third man
length ball, swings into the left-hander, who turns it away towards midwicket where a slight fumble allows a single
full and swinging, Chandimal comes half forward and is beaten by the away movement, very close to the edge there
shorter length this time, but it's another peach as it beats Chandimal again. Southee lets out a half-appeal
full and wide and swings away further, Tharanga went after it and didn't make a connection
aimed towards the legs this time hoping for some swing from that angle, but there isn't any and Tharanga turns it down to fine leg
length ball, swinging into the right hander, Chandimal hits it towards mid on from the inside half of his bat
length ball, doesn't get the shape back into the batsman and Chandimal lets it go
Chandimal is beaten outside off
shorter this time, but same result as Chandimal is beaten again
full and swinging in, Chandimal was off balance as it hit him, there was an appeal, but that looked like missing leg
length ball on off, driven to covers and the batsmen call for a quick single
that is a corker!! Southee bowls it full, on the middle and it goes past Chandimal's outside edge, over the top of off. Chandimal lucky to survive that one.
similar ball, but this time it catches the outside edge and goes to third man
fuller length to the left hander, but it leaves Tharanga
short ball, Tharanga unfurls a cracking pull over midwicket. That was hit with some power
another short ball on his body, but Tharanga manages to pull it down to fine leg and keep the strike
full and swinging, Tharanga has a go at it, but that was too wide
length ball on off stump, beats Tharanga
slightly short of length and Tharanga cracks it past point off the back foot
full and outside off, swinging away and Tharanga lets it go
full and swinging, but Tharanga makes a connection this time and drives it through covers, the heavy outfield slows the ball down
almost a perfect ball, full and starts on off stump, comes in, but luckily for Chandimal, takes an inside edge and goes to fine leg
full and swinging and another play and miss by Tharanga
length ball outside off, Chandimal takes a positive stride to defend it to covers
length ball on the middle, turned to fine leg
short of length, not much movement, Tharanga punches it off the back foot to extra cover
short again to Tharanga, attempts the pull, but bunts it down to the ground, midwicket fields
fuller, outside off and it took off and beat Tharanga's drive. Watling, the keeper, took it over his head
wide length ball, Tharanga drives it nicely, though away from the body, and third man fields
length ball, but instead of swinging away, this one cuts into Tharanga, who manages to get an inside edge and it flies over his stumps to the fine leg boundary
length ball, pitches on middle and leg, and starts shaping away, hits the leading edge but drops down on the pitch
again length on the legs, turned away this time to fine leg
length ball, no movement, Tharanga defends it back to the bowler
full and on off stump, comes in slightly, played towards deep square leg for another single
length ball outside off, Chandimal drives on the up in the gap between extra cover and mid off for a single
length ball, played towards third man
beautiful timing!! short of length by Southee and Tharanga stands up and punches it off the back foot towards square on the off

short of length, and Tharanga, who played that lovely shot last ball, tries to repeat it, but plays it in the air straight to Rob Nicol's hands at point. He was finally looking settled but has been taken down by Southee again.
short ball, quick and the bounce surprises Sanga as he leaves it awkwardly
length ball, defended to mid off and calls immediately, debutant Milne was quick to and it would have been close had he hit
length ball, driven straight back and it hits the stumps at the non-striker's end
length ball, defended back to the bowler, didn't hit the middle of the bat
length ball, beats Chandimal's drive, but now he has to make a connection as a free-hit is coming
short ball, no Chandimal can't make a connection, missed opportunity to get some free runs
a peach of a delivery, swings into Chandimal and beats bat and pad and flies over the stumps.
full outside off, and guess what, another edge takes the ball to third man
down the legs and that has been helped to the fine leg boundary
fuller ball, beats Sanga's attempted drive
short of length, another play and a miss, Chandimal all at sea. Thanks to Saurabh for jinxing him
short and turned off the hips to fine leg, easy get away ball to Chandimal
length ball outside off, left alone
short and Sanga sways out of the line, but that ball is high and is called a wide
full ball, Sanga frees his arms, gets under it and slices it over point, couple of bounces and it flies to the boundary
short ball again, and Sanga gets out of the line easily
short of length, defended towards midwicket
132.9 kph, short and Chandimal punches it in the gap at cover without much timing
loses direction, short and down the leg side
another shorter length outside leg and Sanga pulls it down to fine leg
short and wide and that is driven through point off the back foot. Chandimal finally gets one off the middle
better line this time, on the off, defended on the leg side
short and Chandimal unleashed his cut shot, but the ball cut in and went straight to the keeper
shot and wide again, slightly gets up on Chandimal but he manages to cut it to third man
short of length, defended on the off side
length ball, Chandimal chooses a new option, charges down but manages an inside edge to fine leg
length ball, defended on the off side
short of length on the legs, glanced towards the fine leg boundary
short of length on the off stump line, defended to the off side
fuller length, Sanga defends it towards midwicket this time
143.8 kph, full and that is defended to cover
short and wide, Chandimal cracked it, but unfortunately for him, went straight to point, misses out
short of length, defended towards point.
short, wide and swing away, Chandimal had a go at that too, but misses it
short of length and came back off the seam, Chandimal almost ended up playing it on, again lucky
short and wide, Chandimal cuts it well this time, but there is a fielder in the deep for the shot, Franklin, who lets it go between his legs. Shoddy.
driven firmly to extra cover, slight fumble allows a single
short and Chandimal gets into a tangle as he plays an awkward pull towards deep midwicket
length ball on the middle, defended to the leg side
slower ball, Sanga waits on the back foot and turns it towards square leg for a single
short of length, defended back to the bowler
short of length, Chandimal defends it towards mid-on
short and quick, almost takes Chandimal's head off. Too high for the keeper as well as he gets a hand to it but can't stop it from going to the boundary
short of length, defended off the back foot
short of length and beats the outside edge as it deviates away after pitching
fuller length, and is nicely driven towards mid-on where the fielder makes a sliding stop
length ball outside off, Sanga lets it go. That one came in and wasn't too far from the off stump
fuller length, and Sanga shows his class, goes down on one knee and drives it beautifully through the gap in covers
flighted and driven towards midwicket
flighted ball, Chandimal takes two steps down and slams it over the bowler's head for his second convincing shot of the day
flighted on the off, Chandimal wrists it to midwicket area where a fielder is present
shorter in length and this is easily turned to deep square leg
flighted on the off, defended back to the bowler
short ball and is blasted over the infield to the midwicket boundary
short of length, outside off, takes the outside half of the bat and a single to third man
fuller length, goes away with the angle to the left-hander, Sanga lets it go through
full and fast, Sanga manages to get his bat down in time
full toss to follow up the yorker, Sanga fails to thread the gap on off side, hits it straight to cover
short of length, but on the pads, Sanga turns it towards square leg easily
short and wide, Chandimal cuts hard, but the point fielder fails to stop it and the ball ricochets to deep cover
flighted, driven to long on
flighted on the off stump, Sanga dabs it on the leg side for a quick single
short long hop and Chandimal fails to take full advantage, finds the fielder at deep square leg with his pull
flighted on the middle, driven to the left of mid-on for a single
charges down to a flighted ball ouside off, and smashes it past the bowler for another boundary
flighted outside off, defended on the front foot
length ball, outside off, left alone by Sanga
on the offstump, left alone again
short ball and Sangakkara smartly swivel pulls it over deep square leg boundary for a sweetly timed six
short of length, punched off the back foot to deep cover
length ball outside off, Chandimal waits and plays it down to third man off the back foot
length ball on the pads, Sanga turns it past a diving midwicket fielder for a couple
fuller length on the off, Chandimal drives it to midwicket for a single
length ball, outside off, another leave by Sanga
length ball, comes in a bit after pitching on the off, Sanga turns it to the vacant midwicket area, Southee runs around to do the mop up job himself
short and not much width, but Chandimal rides the bounce and plays it down to third man
short of length on off, defended off the back foot
fuller length from round the wicket, defended back to the bowler as Sanga seems to be in no hurry
fuller length, hits the inside edge and rolls to the off side, the batsmen take a quick single
fuller outside off, Sanga went for the drive, the ball takes the outside edge and flies to third man
length ball on the off and middle, driven to mid on
loses direction as he fires one down the leg side, good take by Watling
on the legs again, Chandimal misses his shot, the ball hits the pads and goes through to the off side, no appeal as that was missing leg
short of length on off, left alone by Sanga
length ball outside off, Sanga lets it go again after taking a couple of baby steps down the track
quick short ball, Chandimal wanted to pull that, but the ball got big on him and he took the eyes off. Ball goes straight to the keeper
length ball, dabbed towards point off the back foot
drives towards wide long on for a couple
length ball, outside off, square driven past point
short ball, Chandimal got into a position to pull, wanted to play that towards square leg, but it ends up around midwicket
fuller length, driven straight to short cover
short of length, defended to the off side
another one past the outside edge, Chandimal survives
short and wide, Chandimal cuts it hard but the third man, Franklin,  makes a diving stop to deny the boundary

round the stumps, length ball, comes in with the angle, Chandimal attempts it to drive it through the covers, leaves a wide enough gap between his bat and pad for an elephant to pass through, the ball hits the top of off. No celebration from the bowler, who could have had him out a few times today.
short of length, outside off, Thirimanne lets this go through to the keeper
short of length, defended off the back foot
length ball outside off, left alone
short of length on off, dabbed towards point for a quick single
length ball outside off, another play and a miss. This has been the story of the night
short and gets up, Thirimanne can't make a connection
length ball outside off, lets it go this time
short of good length, defended off the back foot
short of length, defended off the back foot
short ball outside off, Sanga swivel pulls it over midwicket, doesn't get a whole lot behind that but manages to get a couple
down the leg side

Boult gets his second, length ball on off and it leaves Sanga's defensive prod, and is taken easily by the keeper. The umpire has asked for a no-ball check, and Sanga is safe. The replays showed that the ball hit the back pad.
hits it straight to the mid-on fielder, but it was a free hit, so he is safe again
and a play and a miss now
short of length, Sanga wanted to turn it to leg side gets a leading edge down the pitch
lets this one go through to the keeper
short of length ball, defended off the back foot

short and outside off, Thirimanne attempts a nothing pull  from way outside off, the ball takes a bottom edge and the keeper accepts the catch with glee. A nothing shot by the batsman, who probably wanted to finish the game in style
short of length, was winding up for a big shot, but decides to defend it
short of length outside off, defended to cover
short of length, defended off the back foot down the pitch
fuller length, Mathews wanted to drive it through off, but the ball hits the inside half and goes past a diving mid-on for a couple. The scores are finally level.
short of length, solidly defended by Sanga
another solid defensive shot by Sanga, the ball for length on off stump, Sanga got his body behind the ball, and played that with a high elbow, classic.
full and outside off, and Sanga has a go, but that is too wide
